issue.title: [CI] [C++] Print ccache statistics on Travis-CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would allow to know if compilation caching is really in effect.
